how.title: How it Works
how.1: Pick a currency pair and enter the amount to send
how.1desc: Choose from hundreds of coins and exchange any amount without upper limits
how.2: Indicate your receiving address for the selected coin
how.2desc: Add a destination tag (memo, message, etc) if required
how.3: Enter and apply a promo code if you have one
how.3desc: Your bonus will be added to the total amount and displayed in the “You get” field
how.4: Select a fixed or floating rate and click “Let’s Exchange”
how.4desc: A fixed rate excludes slippage for 30 minutes, a floating rate may fluctuate.
how.5: Check and confirm the exchange details
how.5desc: If all the details are correct, click “Accept”
how.6: Send the exact exchange amount to the deposit address
how.6desc: You can scan the QR code or copy the address. Make sure to add a destination tag if required.
how.7: Wait for the exchange to go through
how.7desc: Click “Notify me” to get an email notification when the exchange is completed
how.8desc: Request a receipt if needed; you can also sign up to track your exchange history
how.9desc: Everything’s ready for your easy and secure crypto exchange
